name: ohGosh [Venus-Lotus] - KOG :]
author: Gregulator
notes:
Finally made it to KOG with Venus! Was a troubling season with random stuff like bamboo + restart bricks + Red Eyes being dominant. Last 5 decks were: Phoenix [Beatdown], Red Eyes-Gandora, Weevil Burn, Mind Scan Glads, Phoenix [Beatdown]. 

Also that's the 3rd Venus deck for KOG i believe
